trans-unit.source: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) As long as Honored Hierarch is renowned, it has vigilance and "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

trans-unit.resname: CP3·2 | Seeker of the Way | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Seeker of the Way gains lifelink until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: CP3·2 | Seeker of the Way | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't know where my destiny lies, but I know it isn't here."
Choose one — • Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.) • Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
"Every choice alters the path of fate."\n—Sarkhan Vol

trans-unit.resname: CP3·4 | Dromoka, the Eternal | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

trans-unit.resname: CP3·4 | Dromoka, the Eternal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The bane of countless shattered weapons, each a failure to slay her."\n—Daghatar the Adamant
Trample When Siege Rhino enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
The mere approach of an Abzan war beast is enough to send enemies fleeing in panic.
